title: Wilkommen , WAGs ! The glamorous support squad cheering on England ahead of their first Euros match in Germany - from a stewardess to a Love Island star and a  nepo baby  model
body_text:
Wilkommen, WAGs! The glamorous support squad cheering on England ahead of their first Euros match in Germany - from a stewardess to a Love Island star and a 'nepo baby' model
England's Euro 2024 opener against Serbia takes place on Sunday - and as they take to the pitch, the players will be supported by a host of glamorous wives and girlfriends.
Those cheering from the crowd could include former Love Island star Dani Dyer, whose partner West Ham star Jarrod Bowen's stellar season was rewarded with a call-up to Gareth Southgate's team this summer.
Elsewhere, fans will likely be hoping that Trent Alexander-Arnold's girlfriend Iris Law makes an appearance in Germany. The model's parents are A-listers Jude Law and Sadie Frost.
If that wasn't enough glitz and glamour, the WAGs this tournament also include Jude Bellingham's stunning girlfriend Laura Celia Valk, who's a model, TikTok star, and clothing designer, often sharing her glamorous lifestyle with her many followers.
Here, FEMAIL takes a look at some of the very glamorous partners supporting the Three Lions...
DANI DYER
Girlfriend to Jarrod Bowen
Jarrod Bowen with his partner, Dani Dyer. He has managed to land the approval of her father, tough guy actor and presenter Danny
The pair have twin daughters, named Summer and Star
Dani has been in a relationship with Jarrod since 2021 , after revealing he was the one to slide into her DMs
West Ham star Bowen's stellar season has been rewarded with a call-up to Gareth Southgate's Euros squad this summer - and Dani will be supporting him every step of the way
Dani Dyer appeared in the fourth series of Love Island, which took place in Majorca, Spain, in 2018
West Ham star Jarrod Bowen's stellar season has been rewarded with a call-up to Gareth Southgate's Euros squad this summer.
But it's his romance with Love Island star Dani Dyer which has also long been the subject of fans' attention.
Jarrod has even landed the seal of approval from Dani's father, actor Danny Dyer, who is a lifelong West Ham supporter.
The actor even once joked that he finds 'a bit of romance' in West Ham's X-rated chant about Bowen and his daughter.
The lyrics sang to the 90s dance classic 'Freed from Desire' by Gala go 'Bowen's on fire and he's s******* Dani Dyer.'
But football-mad Danny doesn't appear to mind the singalong and admitted he thinks the light-hearted humour should be viewed as a 'compliment' to his daughter.
Dani and Jarrod began dating in 2021, soon after she split from her boyfriend Sammy Kimmence, with whom she shares her son Santiago.
The reality star rose to fame through her appearance on Love Island in 2018, going onto win the series with her then-boyfriend Jack Fincham.
Sadly the pair's romance came to an end four months after leaving the villa, and Dani rekindled her romance with former flame Sammy.
They then welcomed their son Santiago together in January 2021, but split when Sammy was jailed for scamming pensioners out of £34,000. He has since been released from prison.
Dani and Jarrod then went public with their romance in December 2021, as they shared a sweet Instagram post together.
The couple have enjoyed plenty of lavish holidays together, including trips to Disneyland, a spa break at The Cave Hotel and a cosy getaway at the Bulgari Hotel Milano.
Dani and Jarrod announced that they had welcomed twin girls, named Summer and Star, in May last year.
A few months beforehand, Dani had announced she was moving into her new home with Jarrod, relocating from her £725,000 five-bedroom property in Essex.
IRIS LAW
Girlfriend to Trent Alexander-Arnold
Iris Law, pictured at a party hosted by Frieze and Versace in London in October 2021
Iris Law chose a figure-hugging dress to attend the star-studded Met Gala in New York on May 6 of this year
Trent Alexander-Arnold and Iris Law were first spotted together in early May, and have enjoyed a budding romance ever since.
But much more than a WAG, Iris, 23, is somewhat different from the rest, having been born to A-listers Jude Law and Sadie Frost.
When paparazzi first caught the pair catching coffee in London two months ago, the attention was barely a drop in the ocean compared to the limelight and glamorous lifestyle she's grown accustomed to.
Dubbed the new 'it couple', sources close to The Sun said the duo first met at a photoshoot in April for Guess Jeans, of which they are both ambassadors.
The budding couple then arranged an impromptu coffee date and a walk around Portobello Market, clearly wanting to spend as much time as possible getting to know each other.
The stunning fashion model made her Paris Fashion week catwalk debut for Miu Miu and has gone on to establish herself as one of British fashion's 'it girls'. She has been the face of Burberry, is a beauty ambassador for Dior and has featured in campaigns for Marc Jacobs.
She has also appeared on the cover of British vogue and was featured in the magazine while a toddler.
And it was as a young girl that Iris got her first taste of national headlines. She had somehow managed to find and then begin to swallow an ecstasy pill.
Iris was rushed to a hospital where her stomach was pumped in order to rid her small body of the drug.
The extraordinary incident sparked global media coverage propelling her celebrity parents Sadie Frost and fellow actor Jude Law further into the spotlight.
Police investigated the 2002 incident but concluded that there was no suggestion that Iris had been neglected by her parents.
Iris and Trent are yet to make their relationship Instagram official, but when they do we're sure it'll be another headline moment.
LAURA CELIA VALK
Girlfriend to Jude Bellingham
Jude Bellingham's girlfriend, Dutch model Laura Celia Valk, is reportedly 'completely smitten' with the footballer
Laura, who studied creative business at Amsterdam University of Applied Science, is represented by top modelling agency The Four Models, based in Manchester
Laura continuously shares bikini snaps when she flutters in between Spain and France throughout the year and has also been ranked as one of the 500 hottest women in the Netherlands
Laura is expected to be in Germany supporting her beau throughout the Euro 2024
Jude Bellingham, 20, has enjoyed a fantastic year so far after winning the Champions League with Real Madrid.
The midfielder is now set to be a key player on the England team during this year's Euro tournament in Germany.
And as he gears up for the exciting competition, his very glamorous girlfriend Laura Celia Valk will surely be on hand to give him all the support he needs.
The Dutch beauty, 25, has recently shared photos of a sunny Madrid to her Instagram followers where her new flame Bellingham happens to have an apartment.
The hard working WAG is a model, TikTok star, clothing designer and often shares her glamorous lifestyle with her many followers.
Born in the Netherlands on September 16, 1998, Laura is five years older than Jude, although the age gap has done nothing to keep them apart with the pair enjoying a sizzling romance over the last few months.
The blonde bombshell is both beauty and brains, having studied communication and creative business at the Amsterdam University of Applied Science.
The course, which is fully taught in Dutch, allows students to learn about 'trends in the media world and how to be a content creator within an inspiring, internationally-oriented environment'.
The astute businesswoman is also the founder and owner of social media consultancy agency Bobby Rose, an ambassador for PrettyLittleThing and even once tried her hand at presenting.
Although news broke that the football star and Laura are currently dating, the player continues to keep his private life just that.
MEGAN DAVISON
Married to Jordan Pickford
Megan Davison met Everton ace Jordan Pickford when they were teenagers. The childhood sweethearts have been dating since she was 14 and he was 16 after meeting at school
The couple went out on their first date to the cinema while he was a pupil at St Robert of Newminster Catholic School in their native Washington, Tyne and Wear
Megan Davison met Everton ace Jordan Pickford when they were teenagers. The childhood sweethearts have been dating since she was 14 and he was 16 after meeting at school and share a son, Arlo, five, and baby daughter Astara.
The couple went out on their first date to the cinema while he was a pupil at St Robert of Newminster Catholic School in their native Washington, Tyne and Wear.
Megan, now 28, graduated from university in 2019 while supporting her beau. She even made the move cross country from Sunderland to Liverpool when he signed for Everton for a cool £30million.
She had son, Arlo, in February 2019, and the couple were married in March 2020 at a register office in Crewe, having had to postpone their lavish Maldives nuptials due to the pandemic.
The ceremony was distinctly understated, with Pickford wearing a baseball cap and ripped jeans, while the bride wore Givenchy studded boots and carried a Dior handbag.
However, they celebrated their wedding again in June 2022 with the lavish Maldives ceremony of their dreams.
An Instagram star with platinum hair and a love of shopping, Megan has assumed a 'mother hen' status with the other wives.
Ahead of the opening game of the Euros against Croatia, she arranged a pre-match party for them (pictures from which she shared on Instagram.)
She sparked controversy in December 2021 after sharing a message in support of anti-vax protestors. Megan shared a photo from the so-called Freedom March that sparked chaotic scenes across central London on December 18.
The demonstration, declared a 'major incident' by London mayor Sadiq Khan, was attended by thousands of anti-vaxxers after further restrictions were put in place to slow the spread of coronavirus variant Omicron.
Davison appeared to show a degree of empathy for the mob by sharing a photo of one protestor holding a placard emblazoned with the message: 'Even if you're not conspiracy minded, something in your soul has to say…something is wrong.'
The photo was posted without additional comment from the mother-of-one, and is no longer present on her Instagram account.
Their son Arlo arrived in February 2019 and Ostara in September 2023. Megan and Jordan are very protective of their children and have never posted the faces of Arlo or Ostara on their social media accounts.
Aside from saving a penalty or two for England, Jordan has been Everton's go-to goalkeeper since 2017, appearing in over 250 matches.
GEORGINA IRWIN
Married to Aaron Ramsdale
In August 2022, Aaron Ramsdale announced his engagement to his partner Georgina Irwin
In August 2022, Aaron Ramsdale announced his engagement to his now wife Georgina Irwin.
The Arsenal footballer revealed he had popped the question to his girlfriend of three years in a very lavish hotel proposal.
Revealing the news with his followers, Aaron shared a series of loved-up snaps from the moment in a gallery captioned: 'Forever and always has a nice ring to it.'
The goalkeeper told how the couple got engaged in August as he wrote '11.08.22' alongside the pictures of the romantic moment.
Aaron proposed to Georgina by erecting a huge lit sign which spelt out 'marry me?' and was surrounded by flowers and white balloons.
Georgina is a BA stewardess who also co-owns sportswear brand Gymnetix. Her Instagram page is littered with snaps from her travels, including to Dubai, South Africa and the Bahamas.
In November 2023, the Arsenal goalkeeper took to Instagram to announce the birth of his son.
He posted a photo of himself holding baby Ronnie and grinning widely, with wife Georgina smiling and placing a hand on Ronnie's back.
Following that was a sweet photo of his hands cradling his wife Georgia's hands which were holding baby Ronnie's feet.
Georgina sadly suffered a miscarriage in 2022. She later married Aaron in June 2023 - the same month they announced that they were expecting baby Ronnie.
Aaron captioned the post: 'So about the last few weeks! My beautiful baby boy was born. Ronnie Ramsdale. So grateful for my wife @georginamay_ We love you so much.'
TAMARA GOMEZ
Married to Joe Gomez
Joe Gomez married his wife Tamara in June 2021. She shared a touching photo of them walking down the aisle hand in hand on their wedding day
Liverpool defender Joe Gomez, 27, hails from south London and was a product of Charlton Athletic's youth academy.
He made his England debut against Germany at Wembley in November 2017, but a series of injuries has prevented him gaining momentum.
Gomez married his wife Tamara in June 2021. She shared a touching photo of them walking down the aisle hand in hand on their wedding day.
It's understood the couple have been together for almost a decade. In November, she posted a photo of the pair with the caption: '9 years of us... Happy anniversary.'
She spoke of her pride at the end of Liverpool's season, sharing a sweet snap of them on the pitch at Anfield.
She wrote on her social media account: 'A season to be proud of, my CB, LB, RB,' - hinting at his versatility on the pitch.
ANOUSKA SANTOS
Girlfriend to Luke Shaw
Luke Shaw and Anouska Santos at a black-tie event. The couple have two children - a daughter and a son
Luke Shaw and his long-term partner Anouska Santos, 33, are believed to have started dating before May 2017.
The couple like to keep their relationship private and are not accustomed to regularly posting updates on their activities.
Anouska, though, has been seen accompanying her footballer boyfriend at various Man United-related events.
The couple have two children, Reign and Storie, with another on the way after Shaw revealed that they would soon be welcoming baby number three back in December.
In June last year, Shaw and Santos threw a lavish party to celebrate the first birthday of their daughter Storie.
The event was complete with an elaborate balloon arch and matching three-tier cake. Photographs from the colourful occasion were posted on Instagram by Anouska who themed the party around her own children's accessories brand, Treats.
OLIVIA NAYLOR
Girlfriend to John Stones
John Stones, 30, with girlfriend Olivia Naylor
John Stones' girlfriend Olivia Naylor always looks the part thanks to her thriving salon business
John Stones and girlfriend Olivia Naylor welcomed the birth of their baby boy in 2023 after three years of dating
John Stones and girlfriend Olivia Naylor welcomed the birth of their baby boy in 2023 after three years of dating.
The pair, who both have children from former relationships, were said to be 'over the moon' after learning of Olivia's pregnancy.
Stones welcomed his first child, a daughter, with childhood sweetheart Millie Savage, who he began dating when he was just 12 years old- before a 'devastating' November 2018 break-up resulted in her moving out of their Cheshire mansion.
Olivia, who is a beautician specialising in eyebrows and permanent makeup, was a single mother to her son from a former relationship when she met the football ace in a nightclub.
CHARLOTTE TRIPPIER
Married to Kieran Trippier
Childhood sweethearts Kieran and Charlotte Trippier got engaged in Cyprus in the summer of 2015 before tying the knot in June the following year
The couple returned to England from Madrid in January after Newcastle spent £12million on a transfer deadline for the player
Trippier and wife Charlotte pose for a picture close to the Eiffel Tower in Paris
Newcastle defender Kieran Trippier has been married to wife Charlotte since June 2016 and they have three children.
Charlotte's Instagram bio reads 'Family. Fashion. Travel.' The WAG used to also run Instagram fashion blog Style Up Sisters alongside her sister Rosie Wray, however the account appears to no longer be active.
Childhood sweethearts Kieran and Charlotte got engaged in Cyprus in the summer of 2015 before tying the knot in June the following year.
ANNIE KILNER
Married to Kyle Walker
Kyle and his wife Annie Kilner are said to have reconciled following the birth of their fourth child after briefly separating when news of his second paternity scandal came to light
Having supported Kyle through the 2018 World Cup, in March 2019, she dumped him after he allegedly sent messages to Ex On The Beach reality star Laura Brown
Drama: As well as the three children he shares with Annie, Kyle shares son Kairo, 14 months, with ex Lauryn Goodman (pictured)
The past few months have been a rollercoaster for Annie, after she discovered in December last year, when she was pregnant with her and Kyle's fourth child, that her sportsman husband had fathered a second child with Lauryn Goodman with Walker moving out of their home a few weeks later in January.
Instagram influencer Lauryn is the mother to Kyle's son Kairo, four, and daughter, who is known to family and friends as KK and is ten months old.
Lauryn became pregnant with Kairo when Kyle was on a break from childhood sweetheart Annie in 2019 but he was taken back, and they got married in 2021.
MailOnline previously revealed that Annie has decided not to fly as part of the official WAGs group to the Euros.
She is instead planning to hire a private jet and fly in and out for each of England's games in Germany with the four children she shares with Kyle.
The jet will cost Annie around £35,000 for each return journey and she is also planning to take a friend with her to help deal with the youngsters - baby Rezon and sons Roman, 11, Riaan, seven, and Reign, five.
A source told the Mail: 'Things have got really bad between Annie and Kyle, and she is only going to the Euros for the sake of the children. If there weren't kids involved, she wouldn't be going at all.
'She doesn't want to be part of the WAGs group because she doesn't feel she's in a proper relationship with Kyle and doesn't want to maintain any pretence that she is.
'She's told him how she feels and isn't prepared to be in Germany playing happy families with him.'
The source added: 'It doesn't seem right to Annie that she should stay in the WAGs hotel because she doesn't feel like an official WAG.
'The arrangements are being made and she's more comfortable with travelling independently to Germany for each of the games.'
The Football Association usually make all the travel arrangements for WAGs during major tournaments and also provide accommodation for them in an official hotel.
Family time is also scheduled so that players get to spend time with their partners and children.
Annie and Kyle's relationship is said to be at an 'all time low' with the couple barely speaking.
In an effort to to reconcile their differences the Manchester City and England footballer temporarily returned to live in the family home in Cheshire.
But he is now back in a £20,000 per month mansion he rented nearby when their marriage initially hit the rocks earlier this year.
The source said: 'It's as bad as it's ever been, and I fear for the future of their marriage. Kyle isn't in the family home anymore and is out most of the time doing his own thing.
'Even when he won the Premier League, Annie and the kids attended the final match, but they didn't speak at all.
'She didn't even congratulate him and barely smiled, even when he took the children onto the pitch to celebrate.'
LAUREN FRYER
Girlfriend to Declan Rice
Rice pictured with his girlfriend Lauren Fryer grew up in Kingston, south London, to an Irish family and played three friendlies for Ireland in 2018 before controversially switching back to England
Natural beauty Lauren Fryer, originally from Chessington, Greater London, is the girlfriend of West Ham defender Declan Rice
Lauren isn't the only love of West Ham defender Declan Rice's life - she shares his affections with their adorable Cockapoo Raffa
Rice has been flying high in his football career since joining Arsenal in summer 2022, following a stint at West Ham. And the England midfielder's childhood sweetheart Lauren Fryer has been by his side throughout it all.
The couple - who keep most of their relationship private - have been together for eight years and welcomed their first child in August 2022.
Earlier this year, Lauren deleted all of her Instagram pictures after receiving a barrage of abuse online over her appearance.
The 25-year-old wiped all posts from her Instagram page after finding herself the target of cruel online trolls.
She was taunted for her appearance, with the bullying first starting in December last year when an anonymous account told England international team member Declan he 'could do better'.
The account which posted the tweet was suspended after hundreds criticised the taunt.
One wrote: 'Declan Rice is a successful, professional football player. He has a beautiful girlfriend who he has been with since they were both 17. They are also the parents to a beautiful child. He is happy and blessed.'
KATIE GOODLAND
Married to Harry Kane
Harry Kane (pictured with his wife Katie Goodland) is England's record scorer and will captain the team
The England captain married Katie after meeting her in school in Waltham Forest, London
Katie does not always come to the tournaments with Harry, preferring to maintain her privacy
Katie shares snippets of her life with Harry Kane on Instagram including trips taken on private jets
England captain Harry Kane is married to Katie and met while at school in Waltham Forest, East London.
The couple got engaged during July 2017, on a holiday in the Bahamas and married in 2019.
He has four children with wife Kate - Ivy, seven; Vivienne, five; Louis, three; and baby Henry, born last August.
Harry's wife frequently shows her support for the Three Lions on social media but kept a low profile as she joined the Golden Boot bearing striker in Qatar for the World Cup in 2022.
Kate Jane Goodland (who also goes by Katie Kane) has publicly showed her support for Harry for years.
The fitness instructor, 30, has a degree in Sports Science - as well as more than 280,000 followers on Instagram, often posting sweet snaps of both football and family life.
Katie grew up just three streets away from Kane in a semi-detached, four-bedroom home with her mother Kelly and father Gary, who owns a steel and tool business.
She has a younger brother named Tom from whom she inherited her love of football – specifically Tottenham Hotspur, which, Harry went on to play for.
Harry has previously told the Evening Standard: 'She always wanted to do her own thing. She went to university and worked hard.'
The mother-of-four has in the past been said to find his fame 'a little crazy' - but it's clear the couple have a lot of pride in each other's achievements.
The public life doesn't seem to phase Kate, who is regularly photographed attending Harry's matches and celebrating his goals loudly in the crowd.
ELLIE ALDERSON
Girlfriend to Ollie Watkins
Watkins is in a long-term relationship with Ellie Alderson, whom he first got together with in 2018. They welcomed their second child last April
Ellie Alderson, partner of Ollie Watkins, with whom she has two children
Ollie Watkins is in a long-term relationship with Ellie Alderson, whom he first got together with in 2018. They welcomed their second child last April.
Gorgeous Ellie has an identical twin sister Sofia, and is originally from West Berkshire, where the sisters grew up with their mother and brother.
She's thrifty and often sells her clothes on Depop as well as working as an interior designer.
Ellie's Twitter account is full of sweet messages to her beau, including her often saying she's 'so proud' of him.
REBECCA COOKE
Girlfriend to Phil Foden
Rebecca became a mother at age 18 when the couple's son Ronnie was born. Their daughter True arrived two years later
Rebecca Cooke, the girlfriend of Phil Foden at the Champions League last year
Phil Foden and girlfriend Rebecca Cooke, who live in a £3.25million mansion in Prestbury, Cheshire, are believed to have met at secondary school.
The couple now have two children; Rebecca became a mother at age 18 when the couple's son Ronnie was born. Their daughter True arrived two years later - and they have another new arrival on the way.
Phil and Rebecca are believed to have first met at a party when they were teenagers and have been together ever since.
Like Phil, Rebecca is also from Stockport and during her footballing beau's career, Rebecca has largely stayed out of the limelight and keeps her social media accounts private.
Likewise, Phil has followed suit and his partner is rarely seen on his Instagram page, where he boasts millions of followers.
TOLAMI BENSON
Girlfriend to Bukayo Saka
Love match: Arsenal star Saka is dating PR exec Tolami Benson
Tolami has been known to share shots of herself looking glamourous in a bikini on Instagram
They don’t appear on each other’s Instagram accounts, nor do they follow each other... but she has posted pictures of herself at the Emirates in an Arsenal jersey.
She was also at the 2022 World Cup and consoled Saka after England's heart-breaking exit.
Rumours of a sizzling romance between the duo have been buzzing since late 2020 - with suspicions ramping up in 2021 when Tolami posted a photo with someone in a mask on Instagram.
Their romance was eventually uncovered by fans in in 2022 when the pair shared individual pictures on a yacht in Dubai.
Not much else is known about the glamorous WAG who appears to fly very much under the radar.
